description: A spectacular 2,586-meter aerial cable car system ascending Anuria Mountain to 250 meters above sea level, offering breathtaking panoramic views of Batumi, the Black Sea, and surrounding mountains. Part of the Argo Cultural Entertainment Center, this modern cable car provides a scenic 15-minute journey with 360-degree views from the hilltop station.
highlights: Ascends to 256 meters elevation (about 250 meters above sea level)
20 gondolas with 8 seats each operating continuously
Lower station located near Batumi harbor
Upper station on Anuria Mountain with 360-degree viewing platform
Spectacular day and night views - illuminated cityscape after dark
Cafe and souvenir shop at the top station
Wheelchair accessible with lifts at both stations
Operating hours: 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM daily
Photography allowed and encouraged during the ride
UNESCO-recognized Georgian folklore shows at 8 PM in summer
tips: Visit at sunset for the best of both day and night views
Book evening rides to see the city lights - magical experience
Arrive early during peak season to avoid long queues
Tickets valid for 6 months from purchase date - flexible planning
Bring a camera - views are spectacular from all angles
Stay for folklore shows at 8 PM in summer months
Consider a round-trip to fully enjoy both ascent and descent views
Morning rides offer clearer visibility for mountain views
The ride is smooth and suitable for all ages
Combine with other Argo entertainment center activities at the top
Standard ticket: 30 GEL, children 5-12: 7 GEL, under 5: 10 GEL
Check weather forecast - cloudy days may obscure views
vibe: Exhilarating yet relaxing, romantic and family-friendly. The gentle glide above Batumi creates a sense of peaceful excitement. Couples find it romantic, especially during sunset, while families enjoy the safe adventure. The atmosphere shifts from serene appreciation during the day to enchanted wonder when the city lights illuminate below at night.
expectations: A quick cable car ride offering nice city views
Brief photo opportunity at the top
Similar to other cable cars worldwide

360-degree views encompass city, sea, mountains, and coastline simultaneously

15 minutes each way allows time to fully absorb the changing perspectives
The smooth, modern gondolas feel safe and comfortable
